To check if more than 1 argument is passed to ?
```{r}
...length() > 1L
# returns NULL silently if fails
switch(2L, ...)

```


To find if formula **~** is used
```{r setup, eval = F}
stringi::stri_detect_fixed(x, pattern = "~", negate = T, max_count = 1L)
stringi::stri_locate_all_fixed(x, "~")
as.character(as.expression(..2))

# store glyph as global variable [2us]
glyph == ..2[[1]]

# to enable type checking
tryCatch(class(..2) == "formula", error = function(e) F
```
